scripts.test: npm i && npm run bootstrap && lerna run test
scripts.web: npm run bootstrap && cd ./packages/web && npm run dev
scripts.desktop: npm run bootstrap && cd ./packages/desktop && npm run dev
scripts.publish: git checkout master && git pull origin master && npm t && lerna publish --conventional-commits
scripts.publish-dryrun: git checkout master && git pull origin master && npm t && lerna publish --conventional-commits --skip-git --skip-npm
